original_text: The king of Israel said to King Jehoshaphat, ‘I told you what he would say! He never says that anything good will happen to me. He only says that I will have trouble.’
korean_text: 이스라엘의 왕이 여호사밧 왕에게 이르되 저 사람이 내게 대하여 길한 것을 예언하지 아니하고 흉한 것을 예언하겠다고 당신에게 말씀하지 아니하였나이까

sentences.original_text: The king of Israel said to King Jehoshaphat
I told you what he would say
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그가 무엇을 말할지 너에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: He never says that anything good will happen to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나에게 좋은 일이 일어날 것이라고 결코 말하지 않는다

sentences.original_text: He only says that I will have trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 내가 고난을 겪을 것이라고만 말한다
